translation.en: [Cory] A Cory Carson Christmas.
translation.zh: （Go！Go！小小车向前冲：圣诞节）

translation.en: Dear Santa Cars, all I want for Christmas this year
translation.zh: 亲爱的圣诞汽车 我这个圣诞节只想要

translation.en: is the Honkin Henry Extreme,
translation.zh: 超级大喇叭亨利

translation.en: batteries not included, so please send some of those, too.
translation.zh: 没包括电池 所以请你也送些来

translation.en: -It comes in an assortment of colors... -[sniffs, exhales]
translation.zh: 它有很多种颜色 随便一个颜色都行

translation.en: ...and really any color will do, but to be honest,
translation.zh: 它有很多种颜色 随便一个颜色都行 但坦白说 我最喜欢的是橙色的

translation.en: I like orange the best. I'm not sure why.
translation.zh: 但坦白说 我最喜欢的是橙色的 不知道为什么

translation.en: Hmm. Love, Cory Carson. There.
translation.zh: 带着爱 科里·卡尔森 -好了 -科里？

translation.en: Cory? Christmas is three days away. Those cookies are gonna get stale.
translation.zh: -好了 -科里？ 三天后才是圣诞节呢 那些饼干会变质的

translation.en: I know! I'm just so excited about getting the Honkin Henry Extreme!
translation.zh: 我知道啊！ 我只是很兴奋得到超级大喇叭亨利！

translation.en: I want macaroni, please!
translation.zh: 我想要通心粉！

translation.en: [laughs] Well, we'll see what Santa brings. Huh?
translation.zh: 那我们等着看 圣诞汽车会带什么给你们吧

translation.en: Whoa, did you guys hear that?
translation.zh: 哇 你们有听到吗？

translation.en: Let's go check it out.
translation.zh: 去看看是什么吧

translation.en: [Cory, Chrissy] Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: [groans] What happened?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？

translation.en: You crashed into our yard. Where were you headed?
translation.zh: 你撞进了我们的院子里 你赶着去哪里啊？

translation.en: Well, I was headed straight to... to, um, to...
translation.zh: 我正去着… 去…

translation.en: Huh. I don't remember where I was headed.
translation.zh: 我不记得我想去哪里了

translation.en: Well, do you have an address we could look up?
translation.zh: 那你有任何地址让我们查查看吗？

translation.en: Uh, I, I don't seem to be able to remember that either.
translation.zh: 我也不记得了

translation.en: -Oh, you've got a big dent. -Huh?
translation.zh: 你有了个好大的凹痕

translation.en: You must have hit your head when you crashed.
translation.zh: 你一定是撞车时碰到了头

translation.en: We better get you inside for now.
translation.zh: 我们还是先把你带进去吧

translation.en: Good idea.
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: Thanks for letting me stay,
translation.zh: 谢谢你们让我留下

translation.en: but I should really be getting back to, uh,
translation.zh: 但我真的得回…

translation.en: uh, somewhere.
translation.zh: 某某地方了

translation.en: Nonsense. You stay as long as you need.
translation.zh: 别客气了 你留下吧

translation.en: I'll find you some blankets.
translation.zh: 我找些被子给你

translation.en: Hmm. Why does he look so familiar?
translation.zh: 他怎么看起来那么面熟啊？

translation.en: Oh, ho, hello there!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: Oh! Oh, uh, hi!
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: And who might you be?
translation.zh: 你是哪位啊？

translation.en: My name's Cory.
translation.zh: 我叫科里

translation.en: Hello, Cory, my name's, uh, it's, uh...
translation.zh: 你好 科里 我的名字是… 是…

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, I don't really remember my name.
translation.zh: 我不记得我的名字了

translation.en: -[Chrissy] Yum, yum, yum, yum... -Huh? ...yum, yum, yum. Cookies!
translation.zh: 好吃极了！饼干！

translation.en: Chrissy! We're supposed to be saving those for... Santa.
translation.zh: 科丽茜！ 我们必须留那些给… 圣诞汽车！

translation.en: [gasps] Santa Cars is in my house!
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车来我家了！

translation.en: [laughs nervously] Excuse us for a second.
translation.zh: 失陪一下

translation.en: [whispering] Come on Chrissy.
translation.zh: 来吧 科丽茜

translation.en: Chrissy! It's Santa Cars.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 那是圣诞汽车啊！

translation.en: Santa? Where?
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车？在哪里？

translation.en: In the living room. Look.
translation.zh: 在客厅里 看！

translation.en: Those kids. [laughs]
translation.zh: 那孩子们真是的

translation.en: Papa?
translation.zh: 爸爸？

translation.en: No, not Papa! The other guy.
translation.zh: 不 不是说爸爸！那另一个人！

translation.en: Hey, I've got your blankets.
translation.zh: 我把被子带来了

translation.en: Oh, why thank you.
translation.zh: 太谢谢你了

translation.en: Pfft, that's not Santa.
translation.zh: 那才不是圣诞汽车

translation.en: Look closer.
translation.zh: 仔细看看

translation.en: Hey, uh, maybe you left your wallet in your trunk.
translation.zh: 嘿 也许你的皮带在你的后备箱里呢

translation.en: Oh, ho. Good thinking. Ho ho ho!
translation.zh: 好主意

translation.en: Where did all these presents come from?
translation.zh: 这些礼物到底是从哪里来的？

translation.en: -[gasps] Santa! [giggles] -I can't remember. Oh, ho ho!
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车！ 我不记得了

translation.en: Macaroni, please.
translation.zh: 请你给我通心粉！

translation.en: OK, Chrissy. Time for bed.
translation.zh: 好了 科丽茜 是时候睡觉了

translation.en: Macaroni!
translation.zh: 通心粉！

translation.en: Psst, hey. I've got something for you.
translation.zh: 嘿 我有东西给你

translation.en: Something for me?
translation.zh: 有东西给我？

translation.en: Yeah, here you go.
translation.zh: 对啊 这里

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Cory.
translation.zh: 哦 谢谢你 科里

translation.en: Uh, this is a very nice envelope.
translation.zh: 这是个很漂亮的信封

translation.en: Sorry I don't have something to give to you.
translation.zh: 我没东西给你 真对不起

translation.en: [laughs] That's OK. I can wait three days.
translation.zh: 没关系 我等得了三天

translation.en: What's in three days?
translation.zh: 三天后是什么日子？

translation.en: Come on. You don't have to pretend with me. I know.
translation.zh: 少来了 你不必在我面前做戏 我已经知道了

translation.en: You know, three days. Till Christmas?
translation.zh: 三天后的日子啊 你知道的 圣诞节啊？

translation.en: Christmas? What's Christmas?
translation.zh: 圣诞节？圣诞节是什么？

translation.en: Wait, you really don't remember?
translation.zh: 等等 你真的不记得了？

translation.en: But if you don't remember that you're Santa,
translation.zh: 但若你连自己是圣诞汽车都忘了的话

translation.en: that means nobody's gonna get their presents.
translation.zh: 那不会有人能收到礼物了！

translation.en: I'm not gonna get my Honkin Henry Extreme,
translation.zh: 我就得不到 我的超级大喇叭亨利了

translation.en: and Christmas... [gasps] Christmas is gonna be ruined! Mama, Papa!
translation.zh: 而圣诞节… 圣诞节就会被毁了！ 妈妈 爸爸！

translation.en: Cory, what's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了 科里？

translation.en: He doesn't even remember what Christmas is.
translation.zh: 他连圣诞节是什么都不记得了

translation.en: We need to go see Dr. Wiperglass right now!
translation.zh: 我们得现在去看雨刮镜医生！

translation.en: Hmm. Yup, it appears he has amnesia.
translation.zh: 嗯 看来他得了失忆症

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不好了

translation.en: Uh, oh, no.
translation.zh: 不好了

translation.en: Could you explain what that is? Uh, you know, for the children.
translation.zh: 你能解释那意思吗？ 因为…孩子们不理解

translation.en: Amnesia is when you can't remember anything, even who you are.
translation.zh: 失忆症意思是 什么都不记得了 包括自己的身份

translation.en: Sometimes it happens when you bump your head.
translation.zh: 有时碰到头就会这样

translation.en: What? Well, how long until he can remember?
translation.zh: 什么？那他需要多久才能想起来？

translation.en: Hmm, could be a while.
translation.zh: 可能需要一阵子吧

translation.en: But Christmas is in three days!
translation.zh: 但三天后就是圣诞节了！

translation.en: Well, some cars recover faster if they're surrounded by familiar things.
translation.zh: 有些车看到熟悉的东西时 会能更快地康复

translation.en: Hmm, so, if I show him familiar things, he might remember who he is?
translation.zh: 所以如果我给他看熟悉的东西 他就会记起他的身份吗？

translation.en: He just might.
translation.zh: 有这个可能

translation.en: OK, come on, Santa.
translation.zh: 好的 走吧 圣诞汽车

translation.en: Is that me? Am I Santa?
translation.zh: 那是在说我吗？ 我是圣诞汽车吗？

translation.en: If you are, I could really use a new espresso machine this year. [laughs]
translation.zh: 是的话 我今年好想要个新的咖啡机呢

translation.en: Uh, OK.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'll have you remembering in no time.
translation.zh: 我一下子就能帮你想起来了

translation.en: The most important thing about Christmas is the toys,
translation.zh: 圣诞节最重要的部分就是玩具

translation.en: and this place has got tons of toys.
translation.zh: 这地方有好多的礼物

translation.en: Oh, wow. Hey, does that guy look familiar?
translation.zh: 哦 哇！ 嘿 那个人看起来面熟吗？

translation.en: No, but he sure is a handsome fellow. [laughs]
translation.zh: 不 但他真是个英俊的家伙

translation.en: Why does he have that funny hat?
translation.zh: 他为什么带着那奇怪的帽子？

translation.en: What? That's Santa Cars. That's you!
translation.zh: 什么？那是圣诞汽车 是你啊！

translation.en: [chuckles] Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Come on, let's look at the toys.
translation.zh: 走 我们去看看玩具吧

translation.en: Ahh, here we go. Soak it in.
translation.zh: 我们到了 仔细看看吧

translation.en: This is what Christmas is all about, toys toys toys.
translation.zh: 这就是圣诞节的精髓 玩具！

translation.en: Oh, look at that one. Yeah, this is a nice toy.
translation.zh: 看看那个 对 这真是个很好玩的玩具

translation.en: It's so happy. Do you remember Christmas now?
translation.zh: 它好开心呢！ 你现在记起圣诞节了吗？

translation.en: Come on, remember.
translation.zh: 快记得啊！

translation.en: Sorry, nothing.
translation.zh: 对不起 我什么都记不起来

translation.en: Don't worry. This next thing will definitely work.
translation.zh: 别担心 下一个一定管用

translation.en: Behold, the Honking Henry Extreme!
translation.zh: 瞧 超级大喇叭亨利！

translation.en: Wow, how fun is that?
translation.zh: 哇 真是个酷玩具

translation.en: It's got turbo boost and sonic sound sirens.
translation.zh: 它有涡轮增压功能 也有声波警报器

translation.en: That's pretty neat.
translation.zh: 那的确挺酷的

translation.en: Yeah, I hear it can even do backflips.
translation.zh: 对啊 听说它还能后空翻呢！

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds merry and bright.
translation.zh: 真是有趣

translation.en: [laughs] Well, Santa, you should know.
translation.zh: 身为圣诞汽车 你该最清楚了

translation.en: [gasps] Santa.
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车

translation.en: You've gotten tons of letters about it, right, Santa?
translation.zh: 你该收到很多要求这玩具的信吧 圣诞汽车？

translation.en: -[gasps] -Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车？

translation.en: Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车？

translation.en: Uh, sorry, Cory. I still don't remember.
translation.zh: 对不起 科里 我还是想不起来

translation.en: Man, I really thought that would've worked. Huh?
translation.zh: 哎呀 我还以为那一套会管用呢

translation.en: [shopper] Huh? Santa?
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车？

translation.en: Santa!
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车！

translation.en: Hello there, children.
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们好

translation.en: [all] Santa? Santa. Santa. Santa.
translation.zh: -圣诞汽车？ -圣诞汽车！

translation.en: [chuckles nervously] Uh...
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车！

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 快跑啊！

translation.en: Ah, it's perfect.
translation.zh: 完美！

translation.en: Pardon me! Ah!
translation.zh: 不好意思！

translation.en: Phew, that was a close one.
translation.zh: 哎哟 那真险

translation.en: [chuckles] I guess I'm really popular.
translation.zh: 看来我还挺受欢迎的

translation.en: [gasps] Look out, someone's coming.
translation.zh: 小心 有人来了

translation.en: Be careful with those Christmas decorations! Thank you.
translation.zh: 小心拿着那些圣诞节装饰啊！ 谢谢你

translation.en: [gasps] That's it. Maybe Christmas decorations will help you remember.
translation.zh: 对了！ 也许圣诞节装饰会帮助你想起来！

translation.en: He's right over here. Just come look.
translation.zh: 他就在这里 快来看

translation.en: Cory, you expect me to believe that at this very moment,
translation.zh: 科里 你真的指望我相信

translation.en: parked on my front lawn, is...
translation.zh: 现在站在我前庭草坪的是…

translation.en: Ho ho ho! Hi, Cory!
translation.zh: 你好 科里！

translation.en: [gasps] Santa Cars. Oh, my gosh!
translation.zh: 天啊 是圣诞汽车！

translation.en: Wait, Freddie. He hit his head. He, he doesn't remember who he is.
translation.zh: 等等 弗莱迪 他碰到了头 他记不起他的身份了

translation.en: Really? Aw, jeez, what are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 真的吗？天啊 那我们怎么办？

translation.en: I'm working on it. Could you do me a favor and plug in your Christmas lights?
translation.zh: 我正在想办法 你能帮我个忙 打开你的圣诞灯吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 好啊 没问题

translation.en: Get ready.
translation.zh: 准备好了

translation.en: -Wow. -[Freddie] Whoa.
translation.zh: -哇 -哇

translation.en: [Cory] So, Santa, do you remember Christmas now?
translation.zh: 圣诞汽车 你记起圣诞节了吗？

translation.en: Hmm, nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: I still don't remember a thing.
translation.zh: 我还是什么都想不起来

translation.en: -[chuckles nervously] -[gasps] Oh, [chuckles] hello there.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Am I on the nice list?
translation.zh: 我在你好的清单上吗？

translation.en: Ooh, great idea, Freddie. Santa, you remember the naughty or nice list, right?
translation.zh: 好主意 弗莱迪 圣诞汽车 你还记得顽皮或好的清单吧？

translation.en: The naughty or nice list? What's that?
translation.zh: 顽皮或好的清单？那是什么？

translation.en: It's the list you keep of all the cars that are naughty or nice.
translation.zh: 你用来记录 所有好和顽皮的车的清单啊

translation.en: You know, like me and Freddie are on the nice list.
translation.zh: 对啊 例如我和弗莱迪都在好的清单上啊

translation.en: Hmm, so, who's on the naughty list?
translation.zh: 那谁会在顽皮的清单上？

translation.en: Hi, Cory. What do you want?
translation.zh: 你好 科里 你想干嘛？

translation.en: Well?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: Uh, what's going on?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: She seems nice to me.
translation.zh: 我认为她人挺好的啊

translation.en: What? Oh, no, your calibration is way off, mister.
translation.zh: 什么？不好了 你的感应器出了严重问题 先生

translation.en: Wait, uh, what's happening right now?
translation.zh: 等等 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: This is worse than I thought.
translation.zh: 这比我想象地还糟糕

translation.en: I'm gonna show you everything there is about Christmas. Let's go!
translation.zh: 我会带你去看所有关于圣诞节的东西 走吧！

translation.en: [groans] Nope.
translation.zh: 记不得

translation.en: Hmm, nothing.
translation.zh: 没印象

translation.en: OK!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Mmm... Come on!
translation.zh: 快来啊！

translation.en: Me?
translation.zh: 我吗？

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: Yeah, you got it.
translation.zh: 对 你行的！

translation.en: No, no. No, no, no. -No! -[laughs]
translation.zh: 不好了！

translation.en: -Huh? -Yay! Santa!
translation.zh: 耶！圣诞汽车！

translation.en: Look out!
translation.zh: 注意！

translation.en: Cold! Woo, yeah!
translation.zh: 好冷哦！ 耶！

translation.en: Snow, snow, snow! [giggles]
translation.zh: 下雪了！

translation.en: Hey, guys, it's almost time for the tree lighting ceremony.
translation.zh: 大家 快是树灯照明仪式的时候了

translation.en: What? It's Christmas Eve already? Oh, no.
translation.zh: 什么？今天已经是平安夜了？ 不好了！

translation.en: If you don't remember by tonight, nobody will get any presents,
translation.zh: 若你不在今晚前记起来的话 就没人能得到礼物了

translation.en: and I won't get my Honkin Henry Extreme.
translation.zh: 而我就得不到 我的超级大喇叭亨利了

translation.en: No macaroni?
translation.zh: 没有通心粉？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不好了

translation.en: Christmas will be ruined.
translation.zh: 那圣诞节就会被毁了

translation.en: All right, kiddos. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 小子们 走吧

translation.en: Hey, you should come with us.
translation.zh: 你该和我们一起来

translation.en: Maybe the Christmas music will, uh, ring some bells?
translation.zh: 也许圣诞铃铛会提醒你什么呢

translation.en: [laughs] Bells. I love you.
translation.zh: 铃铛！ 我爱你

translation.en: Bells? Wait a second. That, that sounds familiar.
translation.zh: 铃铛？等等 那听起来有点熟悉

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Bells? You remember bells? Come on, let's go!
translation.zh: 天啊 铃铛？你记得铃铛？ 那快走吧！

translation.en: Yay!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [Mama] Cory, slow down.
translation.zh: 慢点走 科里

translation.en: Come quick, come quick. This way.
translation.zh: 快来 这里啊！

translation.en: We're definitely gonna find something here. [gasps]
translation.zh: 在这里一定能找到能帮助的东西

translation.en: How's this? You remember this bell?
translation.zh: 这个呢？这铃铛你记得吗？

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: [gasps] how 'bout this?
translation.zh: 那这个呢？

translation.en: Does this remind you of anything?
translation.zh: 这有让你想起什么吗？

translation.en: Hmm, nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Sorry, not this bell either.
translation.zh: 对不起 也不是这个铃铛

translation.en: What? There's gotta be something that'll work. Hmm?
translation.zh: 什么？ 一定会有管用的东西的

translation.en: Welcome to the Bumperton Hills Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到邦伯顿山树灯照明仪式

translation.en: We'll be decorating the tree together,
translation.zh: 我们会一起给树上装饰

translation.en: and Eileen will top it all off with the Carol of the Bells.
translation.zh: 然后埃琳会唱《圣诞钟声》

translation.en: [gasps] This is it. This'll definitely work. Come on!
translation.zh: 就是这个了 这一定有效的 快来啊！

translation.en: -Ooh. -Oh, this is gonna be great.
translation.zh: 这一定会很棒的！

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.zh: 好棒

translation.en: What do you think, Santa? Huh? Santa?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢 圣诞汽车？ 圣诞汽车？

translation.en: Whoa [giggles] Higher, Daddy, higher. [giggles]
translation.zh: 高点 爸爸 再高一点！

translation.en: [giggles] Higher, Daddy. Higher!
translation.zh: 高点 爸爸 再高一点！

translation.en: [gasps] I, I remember now.
translation.zh: 我想起来了

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: I remember everything now.
translation.zh: 我一切都想起来了

translation.en: You remember you're Santa?
translation.zh: 你记得你是圣诞汽车了？

translation.en: No. [laughs] I remember my family. My name is Benjamin Bell.
translation.zh: 不是 我想起我的家人了 我的名字是本杰明·铃铛

translation.en: What? Benjamin Bell?
translation.zh: 什么？本杰明·铃铛？

translation.en: Yes, Benjamin Bell, I'm from Spoiler Valley.
translation.zh: 是的 本杰明·铃铛 我来自斯波勒山谷

translation.en: I live there with my family.
translation.zh: 我和家人一起住在那里

translation.en: [Mama gasps] Your family? Did you get your memory back?
translation.zh: -你的家人？ -你的记忆恢复了吗？

translation.en: You're not Santa?
translation.zh: 你…不是圣诞汽车？

translation.en: I, I guess not.
translation.zh: 我… 看来不是吧

translation.en: You're not Santa.
translation.zh: 你不是圣诞汽车

translation.en: Hmm. Sorry, Cory.
translation.zh: 对不起 科里

translation.en: That's, that's OK. Um, I'm glad you remembered who you are.
translation.zh: 没…没关系 我只是很开心你记起了自己的身份

translation.en: Thanks, Cory.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 科里

translation.en: Wait, if you're not Santa,
translation.zh: 等等 若你不是圣诞汽车

translation.en: that means the real Santa's OK!
translation.zh: 那意思是真正的圣诞汽车没事了！

translation.en: He's probably delivering gifts out there right now.
translation.zh: 他大概正在送礼物吧

translation.en: Yeah! Christmas is saved! Woohoo!
translation.zh: 耶！圣诞节得救了！

translation.en: -[laughs] Yeah! Yeah! -[laughs] Well,
translation.zh: -耶！ -那么… -耶！ -你知道这个该怎么处理了

translation.en: you know what to do with this.
translation.zh: -耶！ -你知道这个该怎么处理了

translation.en: [gasps] My letter. I gotta put this up for the real Santa.
translation.zh: 我的信！ 我得准备把它给真的圣诞汽车看

translation.en: Let's go, hurry. [chuckles] Honkin Henry, here I come.
translation.zh: 快走吧！ 我来了 大喇叭亨利！

translation.en: Milk and cookies, check. Letter, check.
translation.zh: 牛奶和饼干 准备好了 信 准备好了

translation.en: Everything else, check, check, check. [sighs] It's all done.
translation.zh: 其他的 也准备好了 一切都准备好了

translation.en: -Spoiler Valley? That's a three day drive. -Hmm?
translation.zh: 斯波勒山谷？ 那离这里是三天的车程呢

translation.en: Three days? I, I better get going then.
translation.zh: 三天？ 那我还是赶紧先走了

translation.en: Are you sure? It's dark and icy out there.
translation.zh: 你确定吗？ 外面好黑 路又冰又滑啊

translation.en: We wouldn't want you to get hurt again.
translation.zh: 我们不想你再次受伤

translation.en: [sighs] I guess I won't see my family for Christmas this year.
translation.zh: 看来我今年圣诞节 不会和我家人一起庆祝了

translation.en: Well, you're more than welcome to stay here with us.
translation.zh: 我们欢迎你留在这 和我们一起庆祝

translation.en: Thanks, that's, that's very kind of you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你们人太好了

translation.en: Try and get some rest for now, all right?
translation.zh: 现在先休息一会儿吧 好吗？

translation.en: Goodnight, Ben. Come on, kids.
translation.zh: 晚安 本 来吧 孩子们 得去睡觉让圣诞汽车送些礼物了

translation.en: Gotta get to bed so Santa can deliver some presents.
translation.zh: 来吧 孩子们 得去睡觉让圣诞汽车送些礼物了

translation.en: Macaroni! [giggles]
translation.zh: 通心粉！

translation.en: I'm sorry you won't be able to spend Christmas with your family this year.
translation.zh: 我很难过 你今年不能和家人一起庆祝圣诞节

translation.en: [sighs] Me too, Cory.
translation.zh: 我也是 科里

translation.en: Thanks for helping me remember though. I'm glad Christmas isn't ruined.
translation.zh: 但谢谢你帮了我恢复记忆 我很开心圣诞节没被毁了

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Papa] Cory!
translation.zh: 科里！

translation.en: Coming! Goodnight, Santa.
translation.zh: 来了！ 晚安 圣诞汽车

translation.en: Oh, I mean, goodnight, Mr. Bell.
translation.zh: 我是说 晚安了 铃铛先生

translation.en: [Cory] Dear Santa, I've been thinking a lot about Christmas lately
translation.zh: 亲爱的圣诞汽车 我最近一直在思考圣诞节的事

translation.en: like you always do.
translation.zh: 就和你一样

translation.en: There's a lot of things that make Christmas, Christmas.
translation.zh: 让圣诞节有圣诞气氛的东西很多

translation.en: The toys, the traditions, the lights, the toys,
translation.zh: 玩具 传统 灯光 玩具…

translation.en: but today, I learned that Christmas isn't just about getting gifts...
translation.zh: 但今天 我明白了圣诞节的重点 并不是能收到的礼物

translation.en: -[Cory] ...it's about giving them. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 而是我们带给别人的礼物

translation.en: [Cory] Sometimes that gift can be a hug or a song or a bedtime story.
translation.zh: 有时候 礼物能是拥抱 一首歌 或一个睡前故事

translation.en: Christmas isn't about what's under the tree, it's about who's around it.
translation.zh: 圣诞节重要的 并不是树下的礼物 而是站在树周围的人

translation.en: -I know it's super late... -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我知道时候不早了

translation.en: ...but I wanted to switch my Christmas wish.
translation.zh: 但我想更改我的圣诞节愿望

translation.en: For my present this year, I want my new friend Mr. Bell
translation.zh: 我今年的礼物 只想要我的新朋友 铃铛先生

translation.en: to be able to spend Christmas with his family.
translation.zh: 能够和他的家人一起度过圣诞节

translation.en: I hope it's not too much trouble to change my wish.
translation.zh: 希望改变我的愿望 不会给你带来太多麻烦

translation.en: Thanks for all the hard work and merry Christmas, Santa.
translation.zh: 感谢你的辛勤工作 圣诞节快乐 圣诞汽车

translation.en: Love, Cory Carson.
translation.zh: 带着爱 科里·卡尔森

translation.en: Christmas Christmas Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞节！

translation.en: [gasps] It's Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞节到了！

translation.en: [gasps] Cookies are gone.
translation.zh: 饼干不见了

translation.en: Yay!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: [gasps] Presents are under the tree! Presents!
translation.zh: -礼物在树下了！ -礼物！

translation.en: Ben's not here! Santa brought Mr. Bell home to be with his family!
translation.zh: 本不在了！ 圣诞汽车带了铃铛先生 回家陪家人了！

translation.en: Brought who home?
translation.zh: 带谁回家了？

translation.en: Ah! Wait, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 等等 你在这里干什么？

translation.en: Uh, I stayed the night. Remember?
translation.zh: 我在这里过夜啊 你不记得了吗？

translation.en: But my letter. My wish.
translation.zh: 但我的信 我许的愿…

translation.en: -[doorbell rings] -Oh, I wonder who that could be.
translation.zh: 是谁来了呢？

translation.en: Your wish? What do you mean? Didn't you get your toy?
translation.zh: 你许的愿？什么意思？ 没收到你要的玩具吗？

translation.en: I changed my wish.
translation.zh: 我改变了我的愿望

translation.en: Changed? What did you change it to?
translation.zh: 改变了？改成什么？

translation.en: Uh, Benjamin?
translation.zh: 本杰明？

translation.en: [Benjamin gasps] Betty? Junior?
translation.zh: 贝蒂？小小？

translation.en: -Oh, we missed you Benjamin. -Daddy.
translation.zh: -哦 我们好想你哦 本杰明 -爸爸！

translation.en: [laughs] How did you guys get here?
translation.zh: 你们怎么来了？

translation.en: Everyone, this is my family.
translation.zh: 大家 这是我的家人

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. We're just opening our Christmas gifts right now.
translation.zh: 天啊 我们正在拆圣诞礼物呢

translation.en: Why don't you come and join us? This is Papa. This is Cory and Chrissy.
translation.zh: 一起吧？ 这是爸爸 这是科里和科丽茜

translation.en: [small laugh] Seems like we have lots to talk about today.
translation.zh: 看来我们今天有好多要谈的了

translation.en: [laughs] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: [laughs] I, I brought you some gifts.
translation.zh: 我给你们买了些礼物

translation.en: Hey, buddy. Did you get your Honkin Henry Extreme?
translation.zh: 嘿 小子 有收到你想要的超级大喇叭亨利吗？

translation.en: I got something better.
translation.zh: 我得到了更好的东西

translation.en: Well, what'd you get Chrissy?
translation.zh: 你得到了什么 科丽茜？

translation.en: It's macaroni!
translation.zh: 是通心粉！

translation.en: [Cory] Merry Christmas, everyone!
translation.zh: 大家 圣诞节快乐！
